root.name: La Storia della Arcana Famiglia
root.description: OverviewLa Storia della Arcana Famiglia (アルカナ・ファミリア) is developed by HuneX and produced by Comfort. It's a visual novel game created for a female audience on the handheld, PlayStation Portable. It is released in Japan on October 27, 2011 with a rating CERO: B. The game has a sequel called Arcana Famiglia: Yūreisen no Majutsushi (アルカナ・ファミリア 幽霊船の魔術師).PlotIt's about Felicità who is the main female lead and the daughter of Mondo, the head of an Italian mafia organization called Arcana Famiglia. On her father's birthday, Mondo announces that he is retiring and will be hosting an Arcana Duello in two months. It's a battle between Arcana Power users, and the winner shall be the new Papa of the organization. Also, he will have the right to marry Felicità.CharactersFelicità -Libertà -Nova -Luca -Debito -Pace -Dante -Jolly -Mondo -Sumire -Game PlayOther MediaThe game spawns a manga and an anime adaptation. In 2011, the manga originally ran in Sylph magazine, and ASCII Media Works published the first tankobon volume in December 2011. In summer of 2012, the anime adaptation premiere in Japan on the Sun TV channel, and it produced by Studio J.C. and directed by Chiaki Kon.
